params.amounts: the amounts of each token to add, in their native precision
params.minToMint: the minimum LP tokens adding this amount of liquidity should mint, otherwise revert. Handy for front-running mitigation

returns._0: amount of LP token user received

params.amount: the amount of LP tokens that would be burned on withdrawal

returns._0: array of token balances that the user will receive

params.tokenAmount: the amount of LP token to burn
params.tokenOut: address of which token will be withdrawn

returns.availableTokenAmount: calculated amount of underlying token available to withdraw

returns._0: current balances of all tokens in pool
address of the token at given index
current balance of the pooled token at given index with token's native precision
the index of the given token address

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

removeLiquidity(uint256,uint256[],uint25.details: Liquidity can always be removed, even when the pool is paused.

params.amount: the amount of LP tokens to burn
params.deadline: latest timestamp to accept this transaction
params.minAmounts: the minimum amounts of each token in the pool        acceptable for this burn. Useful as a front-running mitigation

params.minAmount: the minimum amount to withdraw, otherwise revert
params.tokenAmount: the amount of the lp tokens to burn
params.tokenOut: the address of the token you want to receive

returns._0: amount chosen token that user received

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.amountIn: the amount of tokens the user wants to swap from
params.deadline: latest timestamp to accept this transaction
params.minAmountOut: the min amount the user would like to receive, or revert.
params.tokenFrom: the token the user wants to swap from
params.tokenTo: the token the user wants to swap to

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

calculateRemoveLiquidity(uint256).notice: A simple method to calculate amount of each underlying tokens that is returned upon burning given amount of LP tokens

calculateRemoveLiquidityOneToken(uint256.notice: Calculate the amount of underlying token available to withdraw when withdrawing via only single token

getToken(uint8).notice: Return address of the pooled token at given index. Reverts if tokenIndex is out of range.

getTokenBalance(uint8).notice: Return current balance of the pooled token at given index

getTokenIndex(address).notice: Return the index of the given token address. Reverts if no matching token is found.

pause().notice: Pause the contract. Revert if already paused.

removeLiquidity(uint256,uint256[],uint25.notice: Burn LP tokens to remove liquidity from the pool.

removeLiquidityOneToken(uint256,address,.notice: Remove liquidity from the pool all in one token.

swap(address,address,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Swap two tokens using this pool

unpause().notice: Unpause the contract. Revert if already unpaused.
